pages.text: Apples are food items that can be eaten by the player.$(p)To eat an apple, press and hold use while it is selected in the hotbar or put it in your face. Eating one restores 4 hunger and 2.4 saturation.$(p)Placing an apple into a composter has a 65% (13‚ÅÑ20) chance of raising the compost level by 1.
